title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 900.9 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 900.9 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) Upon receipt of
a certificate of authority, the approved operator shall submit to the
commissioner a fee in the amount of $50 per approved independent living unit
within 30 days of receipt of the certificate of authority. (b) The approved operator shall submit
thereafter to the commissioner an annual fee in the amount of $50 per approved
independent living unit upon submission of the annual statement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
900.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
